title.narrative: Women and Youth as bridge builders: Strengthening Resilience in Libya

description.narrative: As part of the 3rd Dutch National Action Plan 1325, this 3-year program establishes an effective partnership between Dutch and Libyan NGO's. It contributes to the general objective of the Netherlands NAP 1325 to contribute to an enabling environment for women's participation and empowerment in conflict and post-conflict environments, so they can meaningfully participate in conflict prevention, resolution, peace building, protection, relief and recovery. The program aims to deepen local partnerships through capacity building, programming, knowledge sharing and lobby and advocacy. Learning and critical reflection through plenary workshops will strengthen the collective efforts to enable Libyan women and men to play their role as bridge builders in their community
Libyan local women, men and youth, Libyan Civil Society

The project has the following specific goals:
To enhance the human security situation with specific attention to women’s safety.
To contribute to a decrease in harmful, underlying gender norm, values and practices in women and men’s lives.
To provide opportunities for women and men to participate meaningfully and equally in various peace processes and in conflict resolution and prevention.

participating-org.narrative: Government of the Netherlands - Ministry of Foreign Affairs

title.narrative: Security & Justice Corporate Indicators
Number of beneficiaries reached (SJ)

description.narrative: Number of people who benefitted directly/indirectly through activities implemented or services established/enabled/improved by a Cordaid security and justice project/programme

title.narrative: Security & Justice Thematic Indicators
Number of actions to support operationalization of UN resolution 1325 by provincial and national authorities
Number of observable changes in social actors that contribute to subverting harmful gender norms and values
DD4: Number of advocacy initiatives carried out by CSOs, for, by or with their membership/constituency

description.narrative: Counts each occasion that the program partners succeed in engaging with a new lobby target (decision-makers and power holders) on an important advocacy topic.

title.narrative: Number of communities capacitated to improve local security and justice situation
DD5: Number of CSOs with increased L&A capacities

description.narrative: Increased lobby and advocacy capacity of CSOs. The capacity is evaluated yearly.

title.narrative: DD3: Number of times that CSOs succeed in creating space for CSO demands and positions through agenda setting, and/or influencing the debate

description.narrative: Number of times lobby and advocacy targets (decision-makers and power holders) include CSOs in the decision making process or react upon the issues brought forward by the program partners.
